name: Flux
description: Generates an image via the Flux model.

model.title: Model
model.description: The Machine Learning model to use for image generation.

description.title: Description
description.description: What do you want to generate?
description.default: a cat eating a nano-banana in a fancy restaurant under the Gemini constellation

aspectRatio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspectRatio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated image.

specifications.label: Generate an image from text
specifications.description: Asks the user a textual prompt and an aspect ratio and then sends a request to Google Gemini to generate an image with that prompt, saves the image in the extension repository with all its metadata, and eventually opens the generated image.

accessToken.title: Hugging Face Access Token
accessToken.description: The Hugging Face access token that will be used to retrieve the Flux tensor file.
